cluster.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a group of things of the same kind that are very close together
cluster.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: a cluster of low farm buildings
cluster.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a group of people all in the same place
cluster.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: A cluster of children stood around the ice cream van.
cluster.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a group of sectors on one or more computer disks
cluster.translation[1].definitions[0].de: if a group of people or things cluster somewhere, or are clustered somewhere, they form a small group in that place
cluster.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Reporters clustered around the palace gates for news.
Industries in Britain tend to be clustered together.
